name: Brainhub
tagline: Top JS consultants ready to build your product
description:
We are JavaScript consultants who built 60+ highly scalable web, mobile & custom solutions to help our Clients' business grow even faster.
Thanks to our JS expertise, companies like National Geographic, Paradox Interactive, and Venture Harbour are in our portfolio.
 
We help Managers and Executives developing their projects on time and caring about the quality. We are ready to build your product comprehensively – from ideation to deliver a ready product and scaling.
✓ COMPLETE TEAM UNDER ONE ROOF
50+ consultants ready to build your product
Developers, Architects, UI/UX Designers, Product Owners, and QA Engineers
✓ OUR MINDSET MAKES US SPECIAL
Powerful ownership means that we have a direct impact on the project direction 
Consultancy attitude allows us solving real problems through perfect communication skills
Outcome-oriented approach makes your business succeed in the long run
✓ SKILL YOU NEED TO BUILD A DIGITAL PRODUCT
Digital Product Development
UI/UX Design
Web Development
Mobile Development
Custom Software Development
Tech & Agile Consulting
As one of the fastest-growing technology companies in Europe (18x revenue growth within 3 years) and with 50+ truly engaged people we're eager to help technology-driven companies to achieve their business goals with our help. We are based in Poland but also are present in the US, UK and in countries of Central Europe.
Write us on sales@brainhub.eu
www.brainhub.eu
